title: Souljah Boy and Anthony Anderson Interview
itunes:title: Souljah Boy and Anthony Anderson Interview
description:
It was return of Big Draco and of course he did not shy away from what and who he got issues with, starting with Kanye West. He also spoke on Young Dolph, gaming, being a pioneer in the Industry and more. Anthony Anderson also stopped by to speak on ABC Canceling 'Black-Ish', National Diabetes Awareness Month and more. Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Defense attorney in the Ahmad Arbery trial, who has issues with Al Sharpton in the court room stating, ‘we don’t want any more black pastors coming in here'.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
